Name: Brie de Meaux
Description: Soft, creamy cow's milk cheese with a bloomy rind and buttery flavor.
FlavorBySource: Cow: Buttery and creamy with balanced flavor from moderate fat/protein

Name: Roquefort
Description: Bold blue sheep's milk cheese with a pungent, salty flavor.
FlavorBySource: Sheep: Sweet rich and oily/nutty from highest fat and protein concentration

Name: Mild Cheddar
Description: Young, creamy cheddar with a gentle flavor. Perfect for everyday sandwiches and snacking.
FlavorBySource: Cow: Buttery milk with minimal aging creates smooth mellow flavor

Name: Sharp Cheddar
Description: Aged cheddar with a tangy, bold flavor and slightly crumbly texture.
FlavorBySource: Cow: Extended aging develops sharp complex tang

Cheese_ID: 2. Cheese_ID: Unique identifier (start from 121 for new cheeses)
3. Milk_Type: Cow, Sheep, Goat, Buffalo, Mixed, Yak (comma-separated if multiple)
4. Origin_Country: Full country or region name
5. Rind_Type: None, Bloomy, Washed, Natural, Waxed
6. Texture: soft, semi-soft, semi-hard, hard, firm, crumbly
7. Firmness_Attribute: Very Soft (15), Soft (25), Semi-Soft (40), Semi-Hard (65), Hard (85)
13. Inclusion_Tags: Comma-separated from: Peppers,Caraway,Wine,Herbs,Truffles (leave empty if none)
14. To import: Convert CSV to TypeScript format using the admin tool
